1035.name: Emberknife
1035.description:
<keyword>7%</keyword> Omnivamp against jungle monsters

• <keyword>Sear:</keyword> Damaging jungle monsters burns them for <magic> magic damage</magic> over 5 seconds.
• <keyword>Challenging Path:</keyword> Smiting 5 times <bold>consumes</bold> this item and upgrades your Smite to <keyword>Challenging Smite</keyword>, increasing its damage to monsters to <true>900</true> and damage to minions to <true>500 +10% target <health>max Health</health></true>. Challenging Smite marks champions for 4 seconds. Damaging a marked champion deals an additional <true> true damage</true> to them over 2.5 seconds. You take 10% reduced damage from marked champions.
• <keyword>Huntsman:</keyword> Killing large jungle monsters grants bonus experience.
• <keyword>Recoup:</keyword> Regen up to <mana> Mana</mana> (based on missing mana) per second when in the jungle or river.

<italic><bold>Consuming</bold> this item grants all item effects permanently and increases Smite damage to monsters. If you have gained more gold from minions than jungle monsters, gold and experience from minions is heavily reduced. <keyword>Healing</keyword> is not reduced on AoE attacks. If two levels behind the average champion level of the game, monster kills grant bonus experience. </italic>
<italic>Only attacks and abilities apply Challenging Smite's burn</italic>

1039.name: Hailblade
1039.description:
<keyword>7%</keyword> Omnivamp against jungle monsters

• <keyword>Sear:</keyword> Damaging jungle monsters burns them for <magic> magic damage</magic> over 5 seconds.
• <keyword>Chilling Path:</keyword> Smiting 5 times <bold>consumes</bold> this item and upgrades your Smite to <keyword>Chilling Smite</keyword>, increasing its damage to monsters to <true>900</true> and damage to minions to <true>500 +10% target <health>max Health</health></true>. Chilling Smite deals <true> true damage</true> to champions and steals <ms>20% of their Move Speed</ms> for 2 seconds.
• <keyword>Huntsman:</keyword> Killing large jungle monsters grants bonus experience.
• <keyword>Recoup:</keyword> Regen up to <mana> Mana</mana> (based on missing mana) per second when in the jungle or river.

<italic><bold>Consuming</bold> this item grants all item effects permanently and increases Smite damage to monsters. If you have gained more gold from minions than jungle monsters, gold and experience from minions is heavily reduced. <keyword>Healing</keyword> is not reduced on AoE attacks. If two levels behind the average champion level of the game, monster kills grant bonus experience. </italic>

1040.name: Obsidian Edge
1040.description:
<keyword>8%</keyword> Omnivamp against jungle monsters

• <keyword>Sear:</keyword> Damaging jungle monsters burns them for <magic> magic damage</magic> over 5 seconds.
• <keyword>Auto Path:</keyword> Smiting 5 times <bold>consumes</bold> this item and upgrades your Attack-Smite, increasing its damage to monsters to <true>900</true>.
• <keyword>Huntsman:</keyword> Killing large jungle monsters grants bonus experience.
• <keyword>Recoup:</keyword> Regen up to <mana> Mana</mana> (based on missing mana) per second when in the jungle or river.

<italic><bold>Consuming</bold> this item grants all item effects permanently and increases Smite damage to monsters. If you have gained more gold from minions than jungle monsters, gold and experience from minions is heavily reduced. <keyword>Healing</keyword> is not reduced on AoE attacks. If two levels behind the average champion level of the game, monster kills grant bonus experience. </italic>

1054.name: Doran's Shield
1054.description:
<bold><keyword>Enduring Focus:</keyword></bold> Restore <heal>4 Health</heal> every 5 seconds.
After taking damage from a champion, restore <heal>Health</heal> over 8 seconds.
<bold><keyword>Helping Hand:</keyword></bold> Attacks deal <ad-bonus>5 bonus physical damage</ad-bonus> to minions.

1056.name: Doran's Ring
1056.description:
<bold><keyword>Drain:</keyword></bold> Restore <mana>1 Mana</mana> every second, increased to <mana>2 Mana</mana> per second for 5 seconds after dealing damage to an enemy champion. If you can't gain Mana, <heal>heal for 45%</heal> of this value instead.
<bold><keyword>Helping Hand:</keyword></bold> Attacks deal <ad-bonus>5 bonus physical damage</ad-bonus> to minions.

1082.name: Dark Seal
1082.description:
<bold><keyword>Glory:</keyword></bold> <keyword>Takedowns</keyword> grant <keyword>Glory</keyword>, up to 10. 5 <keyword>Glory</keyword> is lost on death.
Gain <ap>4 Ability Power</ap> per <keyword>Glory</keyword>.

1083.name: Cull
1083.description:
<bold><keyword>Reap:</keyword></bold> Restore <heal>3 Health</heal> <keyword>On-Hit</keyword>.
Killing minions grants <gold>1 gold</gold>, up to <gold>100</gold>. Reaching the limit grants another <gold>350 gold</gold>.

1101.name: Scorchclaw Pup
1101.description:
<bold><keyword>Jungle Companions:</keyword></bold> Summon a Scorchclaw that assists you against monsters.
<bold><keyword>Scorchclaw's Slash:</keyword></bold> The companion grows as you hunt monsters, empowering your <keyword>Smite</keyword>. When fully grown, it periodically imbues your next Attack or Ability to burn enemies and <bold>Slow</bold> them. Killing large monsters readies this immediately.

1102.name: Gustwalker Hatchling
1102.description:
<bold><keyword>Jungle Companions:</keyword></bold> Summon a Gustwalker that assists you against monsters.
<bold><keyword>Gustwalker's Gait:</keyword></bold> The companion grows as you hunt monsters, empowering your <keyword>Smite</keyword>. When fully grown, it grants <ms>Move Speed</ms> upon entering brush, increased when killing large monsters.

1103.name: Mosstomper Seedling
1103.description:
<bold><keyword>Jungle Companions:</keyword></bold> Summon a Jungle Pet that assists you against monsters.
<bold><keyword>Mosstomper's Courage:</keyword></bold> The companion grows as you hunt monsters, empowering your <keyword>Smite</keyword>. When fully grown, it completes your Jungle Quest.

1104.name: Eye of the Herald
1104.description: <bold><keyword>Active - Consume:</keyword></bold> Crush the Eye of the Herald, begining the ritual to summon Rift Herald. You may click the Rift Herald after it has summoned to control how it charges. This control effect can be done once when it is summoned, and once each time a nearby enemy structure dies.

1105.name: Mosstomper Seedling
1105.description:
<bold><keyword>Jungle Companions:</keyword></bold> Summon a Jungle Pet that assists you against monsters.
<bold><keyword>Mosstomper's Courage:</keyword></bold> The companion grows as you hunt monsters, empowering your <keyword>Smite</keyword>. When fully grown, it completes your Jungle Quest.

1106.name: Gustwalker Hatchling
1106.description:
<bold><keyword>Jungle Companions:</keyword></bold> Summon a Gustwalker that assists you against monsters.
<bold><keyword>Gustwalker's Gait:</keyword></bold> The companion grows as you hunt monsters, empowering your <keyword>Smite</keyword>. When fully grown, it grants <ms>Move Speed</ms> upon entering brush, increased when killing large monsters.

1107.name: Scorchclaw Pup
1107.description:
<bold><keyword>Jungle Companions:</keyword></bold> Summon a Scorchclaw that assists you against monsters.
<bold><keyword>Scorchclaw's Slash:</keyword></bold> The companion grows as you hunt monsters, empowering your <keyword>Smite</keyword>. When fully grown, it periodically imbues your next Attack or Ability to burn enemies and <bold>Slow</bold> them. Killing large monsters readies this immediately.

1111.name: Jarvan I's
1111.description:
<bold><keyword>Jarvan One:</keyword></bold> Give you stats and passives from all boots.

<bold>Requires Augment: <keyword>Quest: SneakerHead</keyword></bold>

1502.name: Reinforced Armor
1502.description:
<keyword>Reinforced:</keyword> Turrets take 80% reduced damage, including True Damage, when no enemy Lane Minions or Rift Herald are nearby.

<keyword>Melee Weakness:</keyword> Turrets take 20% increased damage from melee Champions.

1505.name: Reinforced Armor
1505.description:
<keyword>Reinforced:</keyword> Turrets take 80% reduced damage, including True Damage, when no enemy Lane Minions or Rift Herald are nearby.

<keyword>Melee Weakness:</keyword> Turrets take 20% increased damage from melee Champions.

<keyword>Regeneration:</keyword> Inhibitor turrets have health regeneration but cannot regenerate past their current segment at 30%, 75%, and 100% health.

1506.name: Reinforced Armor
1506.description:
<keyword>Reinforced:</keyword> Turrets take 80% reduced damage, including True Damage, when no enemy Lane Minions or Rift Herald are nearby.

<keyword>Melee Weakness:</keyword> Turrets take 20% increased damage from melee Champions.

<keyword>Regeneration:</keyword> Inhibitor turrets have health regeneration but cannot regenerate past their current segment at 30%, 75%, and 100% health.

2001.name: Recall
2001.description: Teleports your champion to the Summoning Platform after 8 seconds. Any damage taken will cancel the teleport.

2010.name: Total Biscuit of Everlasting Will
2010.description: <bold><keyword>Active - Consume:</keyword></bold> Eat the biscuit to restore <heal>Health</heal> over 5 seconds, increased based on missing health. Consuming or selling a biscuit permanently grants <health>30 maximum Health</health>.

2015.name: Kircheis Shard
2015.description: <bold><keyword>Jolt:</keyword></bold> <keyword>Energized Attacks</keyword> deal an additional <magic>50 magic damage</magic>.

2031.name: Refillable Potion
2031.description:
(2 charges)
Restores <heal>100 Health</heal> over 12 seconds.
Refills upon visiting the shop.

2033.name: Corrupting Potion
2033.description:
<bold><keyword>Active - Consume:</keyword></bold> Consumes a charge to restore <heal>100 Health</heal> and <mana>75 Mana</mana> over 12 seconds. During this time, damaging Abilities and Attacks burn enemy champions for <magic>15 (20 if you cannot gain Mana) magic damage</magic> over 3 seconds. Holds up to 3 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.

<italic>Corrupting damage is reduced to 50% when triggered by area of effect or periodic damage.</italic>

2049.name: Guardian's Amulet
2049.description: <bold><keyword>Recovery:</keyword></bold> Restores <mana>10 Mana</mana> every 5 seconds. If you can't gain mana, restores <heal>3 Health</heal> instead.

2051.name: Guardian's Horn
2051.description:
• <keyword>Recovery:</keyword> Restores <heal>20 Health</heal> every 5 seconds.
• <keyword>Undaunted:</keyword> Blocks 15 damage from attacks and spells from champions (25% effectiveness vs. damage over time abilities).

2052.name: Poro-Snax
2052.description:
<bold><keyword>Active - Consume:</keyword></bold> Serves a scrumptious scoop to a nearby Poro, causing it to grow in size.

<italic>This savory blend of free-range, grass-fed Avarosan game hens and organic, non-ZMO Freljordian herbs contains the essential nutrients necessary to keep your Poro purring with pleasure.

All proceeds will be donated towards fighting Noxian animal cruelty. </italic>

2055.name: Control Ward
2055.description: <bold><keyword>Consume:</keyword></bold> Places a Control Ward that grants vision and reveals enemy Stealth Wards, traps and <keyword>Camouflaged</keyword> enemies.

2056.name: Stealth Ward
2056.description: <bold><keyword>Active - Consume:</keyword></bold> Places a Stealth Ward on the ground that lasts 60 seconds, is <keyword>Invisible</keyword> to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area.

2065.name: Shurelya's Battlesong
2065.description: <bold><keyword>Inspiring Speech:</keyword></bold> Grant nearby allies <ms>30% Move Speed</ms> for 4 seconds.

2138.name: Elixir of Iron
2138.description: <bold><keyword>Consume:</keyword></bold> Grants <health>300 Health</health>, 25% Tenacity and increased size for 3 minutes. While active, you leave a path behind that boosts allied champions' <ms>Move Speed by 15%</ms>.

2139.name: Elixir of Sorcery
2139.description: <bold><keyword>Consume:</keyword></bold> Grants <ap>50 Ability Power</ap> and <mana>15% Mana Regen</mana> for 3 minutes. While active, damaging a champion or turret deals <true>25 bonus true damage</true> ( 5s against champions).

2140.name: Elixir of Wrath
2140.description: <bold><keyword>Consume:</keyword></bold> Grants <ad>30 Attack Damage</ad> and <vamp>12% Physical Vamp</vamp> against champions for 3 minutes.

2141.name: Cappa Juice
2141.description: <italic>Helps you get on a head.</italic> <bold><keyword>Active - Consume:</keyword></bold> This juice does nothing.

2142.name: Juice of Power
2142.description:
<italic>Juices do not stack with themselves, but you can have multiple different ones active.</italic> <bold><keyword>Active - Consume:</keyword></bold> Automatically activates on Combat Start. Drink to gain <ap>30 + 10% bonus Ability Power</ap> or <ad>18 + 10% bonus Attack Damage</ad> for the next round.

<italic>Made with 100% real cherries. Warning: May cause imbiber to deal tons of damage.</italic>

2143.name: Juice of Vitality
2143.description:
<italic>Juices do not stack with themselves, but you can have multiple different ones active.</italic> <bold><keyword>Active - Consume:</keyword></bold> Automatically activates on Combat Start. Drink to gain <heal>300 + 10% Health</heal> for the next round.

<italic>Our specially formulated veggie blend is proven to harden your skin to resist even the strongest attacks!</italic>

2144.name: Juice of Haste
2144.description:
<italic>Juices do not stack with themselves, but you can have multiple different ones active.</italic> <bold><keyword>Active - Consume:</keyword></bold> Automatically activates on Combat Start. Drink to gain <ms>20 + 15% Ability Haste</ms> for the next round.

<italic>For people who gotta go FAST. Made with lightning. REAL lightning!</italic>

2145.name: Lucky Dice
2145.description:
<bold><keyword>Active - Consume:</keyword></bold> Roll to gain 1 additional reroll.

<italic>For when skill isn't enough.</italic>

2146.name: Enhanced Lucky Dice
2146.description:
<bold><keyword>Active - Consume:</keyword></bold> Roll to gain 5 additional rerolls.

<italic>For when skill isn't enough.</italic>

2150.name: Elixir of Skill
2150.description:
<bold><keyword>Consume:</keyword></bold> Grants 1 Skill Point.

<italic>This item does not increase your level or allow allocating skill points past the normal maximum in a skill</italic>

2151.name: Elixir of Avarice
2151.description: <bold><keyword>Consume:</keyword></bold> Grants <true>5 true damage</true> on hit against minions for 60 seconds. When this effect expires, gain 60 gold.

2161.name: Bandle Juice of Power
2161.description:
Drink to permanently gain <ap>20 + 3% bonus Ability Power</ap> or <ad>12 + 3% bonus Attack Damage</ad>. And a hat!

<italic>Made with 100% real cherries. Warning: May cause imbiber to deal tons of damage.</italic>

2162.name: Bandle Juice of Vitality
2162.description:
Drink to permanently gain <heal>200 + 3% Health</heal>. And a hat!

<italic>Our specially formulated veggie blend is proven to harden your skin to resist even the strongest attacks!</italic>

2163.name: Bandle Juice of Haste
2163.description:
Drink to permanently gain <ms>10 + 5% Ability Haste</ms>. And a hat!

<italic>For people who gotta go FAST. Made with lightning. REAL lightning!</italic>

2421.name: Shattered Armguard
2421.description:
<bold><keyword>Shattered Time:</keyword></bold> Armguard is broken, but can still be upgraded.

<italic>After breaking one Armguard, the shopkeeper will only sell you <rarityGeneric>Shattered Armguard.</rarityGeneric></italic>

2422.name: Slightly Magical Footwear
2422.description: Grants an additional <ms>10 Move Speed</ms>. Boots that build from Slightly Magical Footwear retain this bonus Move Speed.

2501.name: Overlord's Bloodmail
2501.description:
<bold><keyword>Tyranny:</keyword></bold> Gain 2.5% of your <health>bonus Health</health> as <ad>Attack Damage</ad>.
<bold><keyword>Retribution:</keyword></bold> Gain up to 12% increased <ad>Attack Damage</ad> based on your percent missing Health.

2502.name: Unending Despair
2502.description: <bold><keyword>Anguish:</keyword></bold> Every 4 seconds while in combat with champions, deal <magic>magic damage</magic> to nearby enemy champions and <heal>heal for 250%</heal> of the damage dealt.

2503.name: Blackfire Torch
2503.description:
<bold><keyword>Baleful Blaze:</keyword></bold> Damaging Abilities deals <magic>bonus magic damage</magic> for 3 seconds.
<bold><keyword>Blackfire:</keyword></bold> For each enemy champion, epic and large monster affected by your <keyword>Baleful Blaze</keyword>, gain <ap>4% Ability Power</ap>.

2504.name: Kaenic Rookern
2504.description: <bold><keyword>Magebane:</keyword></bold> After not taking magic damage for 15 seconds, gain a <shield>magic shield</shield>.

2508.name: Fated Ashes
2508.description:
<bold><keyword>Inflame:</keyword></bold> Damaging Abilities deal <magic>15 bonus magic damage</magic> over 3 seconds.
Deals an additional <magic>45 magic damage</magic> to monsters.

2510.name: Dusk and Dawn
2510.description: <bold><keyword>Spellblade:</keyword></bold> After using an Ability, your next Attack deals <magic> bonus magic damage</magic> <keyword>On-Hit</keyword> and applies <keyword>On-Hit</keyword> effects an additional time.

2512.name: Fiendhunter Bolts
2512.description:
<bold><keyword>Night Vigil:</keyword></bold> Gain 30 Ultimate Ability Haste.
<bold><keyword>Opening Barrage:</keyword></bold> After casting your Ultimate, your next 3 basic attacks gain <keyword>50% Attack Speed</keyword> and <crit>Critically Strike</crit> for 75% of your normal <crit>Critical Strike damage</crit> for 8 seconds. If an attack would already <crit>Critically Strike</crit>, instead it deals <true>10% bonus true damage</true>.

2517.name: Endless Hunger
2517.description:
<bold><keyword>Famine:</keyword></bold> Gain Ability Haste.
<bold><keyword>Feast:</keyword></bold> When a champion that you damaged within 3 seconds dies, gain <vamp>15% Omnivamp</vamp> for 8 seconds.

2520.name: Bastionbreaker
2520.description:
<bold><keyword>Shaped Charge:</keyword></bold> Dealing Ability damage to a Champion or Epic Monster deals an additional <true> true damage</true>.
<bold><keyword>Sabotage:</keyword></bold> Taking down a champion within 3 seconds of damaging them grants Sabotage for 90 seconds. While you have Sabotage, your next Attack against an Epic Monster or Turret deals an additional <true> true damage</true> over 3 seconds.

2522.name: Actualizer
2522.description: <bold><keyword>Mana Made Real:</keyword></bold> For 8 seconds, your mana is Empowered. While Empowered, your spells cost 100% more Mana, you gain increased Ability damage, <keyword>Shielding</keyword>, and <keyword>Healing</keyword>, and your basic ability cooldowns progress 30% faster.

2523.name: Hexoptics C44
2523.description:
<bold><keyword>Magnification:</keyword></bold> Deal up to 10% increased damage with Attacks, based on how far away the enemy is (max damage at 700 range).
<bold><keyword>Arcane Aim:</keyword></bold> When a champion that you damaged within 3 seconds dies, gain 100 additional attack range for 6 seconds.

2524.name: Bandlepipes
2524.description: <bold><keyword>Fanfare:</keyword></bold> <keyword>Slowing</keyword> or <keyword>Immobilizing</keyword> an enemy champion grants Fanfare for seconds. Fanfare grants you <ms>20 Move Speed</ms>. While you have Fanfare, nearby allies, including yourself, gain <keyword> Attack Speed</keyword>.

2525.name: Protoplasm Harness
2525.description: <bold><keyword>Lifeline:</keyword></bold> Taking damage that would reduce your Health below 30% causes you to gain <health> maximum Health</health> for 5 seconds, then heal <health> Health</health> over the duration. While regenerating Health, you gain 15% increased Size, 10% Move Speed, and 25% Tenacity.

2526.name: Whispering Circlet
2526.description:
<bold><keyword>Harmony:</keyword></bold> Gain % Heal and Shield Power.
<bold><keyword>Manaflow:</keyword></bold> Landing Abilities grants <mana>4 max Mana</mana> (doubled vs. champions).
Transforms into <keyword>Diadem of Songs</keyword> at <mana>360 max Mana</mana>.

2530.name: Diadem of Songs
2530.description:
<bold><keyword>Harmony:</keyword></bold> Gain % Heal and Shield Power.
<bold><keyword>Consonance:</keyword></bold> While you or any ally you've healed or shielded in the last 3 seconds is in combat with champions, each second, heal the lowest health nearby ally champion.

3001.name: Evenshroud
3001.description:
• <keyword>Coruscation:</keyword> After <bold>Immobilizing</bold> champions or being <bold>Immobilized</bold>, cause that target and all nearby enemy champions to take 7% increased damage for 5 seconds.

<keyword>Mythic Passive:</keyword> Grants all other <keyword>Legendary</keyword> items <keyword>5</keyword> <armor> Armor</armor> <keyword>and</keyword> <mr> Magic Resist</mr><keyword>.</keyword>

3002.name: Trailblazer
3002.description:
<bold><keyword>Lead the Way:</keyword></bold> While moving, build up to <ms>20 bonus Move Speed</ms>.
At max speed:
• Create a trail that grants allied champions <ms>Move Speed equal to 15%</ms> of yours.
• If you are Melee, your next Attack <keyword>Slows</keyword> the target by 50% for 1 second.

3003.name: Archangel's Staff
3003.description:
<bold><keyword>Awe:</keyword></bold> Gain Ability Power equal to <mana>1% bonus Mana.</mana>
<bold><keyword>Manaflow:</keyword></bold> Landing Abilities grants <mana>5 max Mana</mana> (doubled vs. champions).
Transforms into <keyword>Seraph's Embrace</keyword> at <mana>360 max Mana</mana>.

3004.name: Manamune
3004.description:
<bold><keyword>Awe:</keyword></bold> Gain <ad> bonus Attack Damage</ad>.
<bold><keyword>Manaflow:</keyword></bold> Landing Attacks and Abilities grants <mana>3 max Mana</mana> (doubled vs. champions).
Transforms into <keyword>Muramana</keyword> at <mana>360 max Mana</mana>.

3005.name: Ghostcrawlers
3005.description: <bold><keyword>Wall Walk:</keyword></bold> Gain the ability to walk through walls for 6 seconds. While inside walls, gain 125 move speed. Casting a spell or attacking will end this effect.

3010.name: Symbiotic Soles
3010.description:
<bold><keyword>Synchrony:</keyword></bold> Gain <ms>10 Move Speed</ms> when out of combat.
<bold><keyword>Symbiosis:</keyword></bold> After traveling 150000 units of distance, transform into <keyword>Synchronized Souls</keyword>.

3011.name: Chemtech Putrifier
3011.description:
• <keyword>Puffcap Toxin:</keyword> Dealing damage applies <bold>40% Grievous Wounds</bold> to champions for 3 seconds.

<italic><bold>Grievous Wounds</bold> reduces the effectiveness of <keyword>Healing</keyword> and Regeneration effects.</italic>

3012.name: Chalice of Blessing
3012.description:
• <keyword>Harmony:</keyword> Gain 25% Base Health Regen per <mana>25% Base Mana Regen</mana>.

<italic>'These blessed waters still carry their power to the worthy.'</italic>

3013.name: Synchronized Souls
3013.description:
<bold><keyword>Voidborn:</keyword></bold> Gain Empowered Recall.
<bold><keyword>Synchrony:</keyword></bold> Gain <ms>45 Move Speed</ms> when out of combat.

3026.name: Guardian Angel
3026.description: <bold><keyword>Rebirth:</keyword></bold> Upon taking lethal damage, restores <heal>50% base Health</heal> and <mana>100% max Mana</mana> after 4 seconds of <keyword>Stasis</keyword>.

3032.name: Yun Tal Wildarrows
3032.description:
<bold><keyword>Practice Makes Lethal:</keyword></bold> <keyword>On-Attack</keyword>, gain <crit>Critical Strike Chance</crit> permanently up to 25%.
<bold><keyword>Flurry:</keyword></bold> <keyword>On-Attacking</keyword> an enemy champion, gain 30% Attack Speed for 6 seconds (30 second cooldown).
Attacks reduce this cooldown by 1 second, increased to 2 seconds for <crit>Critical Strikes</crit>.

3033.name: Mortal Reminder
3033.description: <bold><keyword>Grievous Wounds:</keyword></bold> Dealing physical damage applies <keyword>40% Grievous Wounds</keyword> to enemy champions for 3 seconds.

3036.name: Lord Dominik's Regards
3036.description: <bold><keyword>Giant Slayer:</keyword></bold> Deal up to 15% bonus damage against champions based on their <health>bonus Health</health>. Maximum damage bonus reached at 1500 <health>bonus Health</health>.

3039.name: Atma's Reckoning
3039.description: <bold><keyword>Big Hands:</keyword></bold> Gain 0-30% <crit>Critical Strike Chance</crit>, scaling with your <health>bonus Health</health>.

3040.name: Seraph's Embrace
3040.description:
<bold><keyword>Awe:</keyword></bold> Gain <ap> Ability Power</ap>.
<bold><keyword>Lifeline:</keyword></bold> Taking damage that would reduce your Health below 30% grants a <shield> Shield</shield> for 3 seconds.

3041.name: Mejai's Soulstealer
3041.description:
<bold><keyword>Glory:</keyword></bold> <keyword>Takedowns</keyword> grant <keyword>Glory</keyword>, up to 25. 10 <keyword>Glory</keyword> is lost on death.
Gain <ap>5 Ability Power</ap> per <keyword>Glory</keyword> and <ms>10% Move Speed</ms> at 10 or higher <keyword>Glory</keyword>.

3042.name: Muramana
3042.description:
<bold><keyword>Awe:</keyword></bold> Gain <ad>2% max Mana as bonus Attack Damage</ad>.
<bold><keyword>Shock:</keyword></bold> Attacks against champions deal <ad-bonus>1.2% max Mana as bonus physical damage</ad-bonus> <keyword>On-Hit</keyword>.
Damaging Abilities against champions deal <ad-bonus>3% - 4% max Mana as bonus physical damage</ad-bonus>.

3047.name: Plated Steelcaps
3047.description: <bold><keyword>Plating:</keyword></bold> Reduces incoming damage from Attacks by 10%.

3050.name: Zeke's Convergence
3050.description: <bold><keyword>Frostfire Tempest:</keyword></bold> Casting your Ultimate summons a storm around you for 5 seconds. The storm deals <magic>30 magic damage</magic> per second to enemy champions and <keyword>Slows</keyword> them by 30%.

3053.name: Sterak's Gage
3053.description:
<bold><keyword>The Claws that Catch:</keyword></bold> Gain <ad>bonus Attack Damage</ad>.
<bold><keyword>Lifeline:</keyword></bold> Taking damage that would reduce your Health below 30% grants a <shield>decaying Shield</shield> for 4.5 seconds.

3057.name: Sheen
3057.description: <bold><keyword>Spellblade:</keyword></bold> After using an Ability, your next Attack deals <ad-bonus>bonus physical damage</ad-bonus> <keyword>On-Hit</keyword>.

3065.name: Spirit Visage
3065.description: <bold><keyword>Boundless Vitality:</keyword></bold> Heals and Shields on you are increased by 25%.

3068.name: Sunfire Aegis
3068.description: <bold><keyword>Immolate:</keyword></bold> After taking or dealing damage, deal <magic>magic damage</magic> per second to nearby enemies for 3 seconds.

3070.name: Tear of the Goddess
3070.description:
<bold><keyword>Manaflow:</keyword></bold> Landing Abilities grants <mana>3 max Mana</mana> (doubled vs. champions), up to <mana>360</mana>.
<bold><keyword>Helping Hand:</keyword></bold> Attacks deal an additional <ad-bonus>5 physical damage</ad-bonus> to minions.

3071.name: Black Cleaver
3071.description:
<bold><keyword>Carve:</keyword></bold> Dealing <ad-bonus>physical damage</ad-bonus> to champions reduces their <armor>Armor by 6%</armor> for 6 seconds. (stacks 5 times).
<bold><keyword>Fervor:</keyword></bold> Dealing <ad-bonus>physical damage</ad-bonus> grants <ms>20 Move Speed</ms> for 2 seconds.

3072.name: Bloodthirster

222065.description: <bold><keyword>Inspiring Speech:</keyword></bold> Grants nearby allies Move Speed for a few seconds.

222141.name: Cappa Juice
222141.description: <italic>Helps you get on a head.</italic> <bold><keyword>Active - Consume:</keyword></bold> This juice does nothing.

222502.description: <bold><keyword>Anguish:</keyword></bold> Every 4 seconds while in combat with champions, deal <magic>magic damage</magic> to nearby enemy champions and <heal>heal for 250%</heal> of the damage dealt.

222503.name: Blackfire Torch
222503.description:
<bold><keyword>Baleful Blaze:</keyword></bold> Dealing damage with Abilities causes enemies to burn. This damage increases to Monsters.
<bold><keyword>Blackfire:</keyword></bold> For each enemy Champion, Epic Monster, and Large Monster affected by your <keyword>Baleful Blaze</keyword>, gain <ap>Ability Power</ap>.

222504.name: Kaenic Rookern
222504.description: <bold><keyword>Magebane:</keyword></bold> After not taking magic damage for 15 seconds, gain a <shield>magic shield</shield>.

222510.name: Dusk and Dawn
222510.description: <bold><keyword>Spellblade:</keyword></bold> After using an Ability, your next Attack deals <magic> bonus magic damage</magic> <keyword>On-Hit</keyword> and applies <keyword>On-Hit</keyword> effects an additional time.

222512.name: Fiendhunter Bolts
222512.description:
<bold><keyword>Night Vigil:</keyword></bold> Gain 30 Ultimate Ability Haste.
<bold><keyword>Opening Barrage:</keyword></bold> After casting your Ultimate, your next 3 basic attacks gain <keyword>50% Attack Speed</keyword> and <crit>Critically Strike</crit> for 75% of your normal <crit>Critical Strike damage</crit> for 8 seconds. If an attack would already <crit>Critically Strike</crit>, instead it deals <true>10% bonus true damage</true>.

222517.name: Endless Hunger
222517.description:
<bold><keyword>Famine:</keyword></bold> Gain Ability Haste.
<bold><keyword>Feast:</keyword></bold> When a champion that you damaged within 3 seconds dies, gain <vamp>15% Omnivamp</vamp> for 8 seconds.

222522.name: Actualizer
222522.description: <bold><keyword>Mana Made Real:</keyword></bold> For 8 seconds, your mana is Empowered. While Empowered, your spells cost 100% more Mana, you gain increased Ability damage, <keyword>Shielding</keyword>, and <keyword>Healing</keyword>, and your basic ability cooldowns progress 30% faster.

222523.name: Hexoptics C44
222523.description:
<bold><keyword>Magnification:</keyword></bold> Deal up to 10% increased damage with Attacks, based on how far away the enemy is (max damage at 700 range).
<bold><keyword>Arcane Aim:</keyword></bold> When a champion that you damaged within 3 seconds dies, gain 100 additional attack range for 6 seconds.

222524.name: Bandlepipes
222524.description: <bold><keyword>Fanfare:</keyword></bold> <keyword>Slowing</keyword> or <keyword>Immobilizing</keyword> an enemy champion grants Fanfare for seconds. Fanfare grants you <ms>20 Move Speed</ms>. While you have Fanfare, nearby allies, including yourself, gain <keyword> Attack Speed</keyword>.

222525.name: Protoplasm Harness
222525.description: <bold><keyword>Lifeline:</keyword></bold> Taking damage that would reduce your Health below 30% causes you to gain <health> maximum Health</health> for 5 seconds, then heal <health> Health</health> over the duration. While regenerating Health, you gain 15% increased Size, 10% Move Speed, and 25% Tenacity.

222526.name: Whispering Circlet
222526.description:
<bold><keyword>Holy:</keyword></bold> Gain <mana> Heal and Shield Power.</mana>
<bold><keyword>Mana Charge:</keyword></bold> <keyword>After 2 combat rounds</keyword>, this item transforms into <keyword>Diadem of Songs</keyword>.

223002.name: Trailblazer
223002.description:
<bold><keyword>Lead the Way:</keyword></bold> While moving, build up to <ms>20 bonus Move Speed</ms>.
At max speed:
• Create a trail that grants allied champions <ms>Move Speed equal to 15%</ms> of yours.
• If you are Melee, your next Attack <keyword>Slows</keyword> the target by 50% for 1 second.

223003.name: Archangel's Staff
223003.description:
<bold><keyword>Awe:</keyword></bold> Gain Ability Power equal to <mana>2% bonus Mana.</mana>
<bold><keyword>Mana Charge:</keyword></bold> <keyword>After 2 combat rounds</keyword>, this item transforms into <keyword>Seraph's Embrace</keyword>.

223004.name: Manamune
223004.description:
<bold><keyword>Awe:</keyword></bold> Gain bonus <ad>Attack Damage equal to </ad>.
<bold><keyword>Mana Charge:</keyword></bold> <keyword>After 2 combat rounds</keyword>, this item transforms into <keyword>Muramana</keyword>.

223005.name: Ghostcrawlers
223005.description: <bold><keyword>Wall Walk:</keyword></bold> Gain the ability to walk through walls for 6 seconds. While inside walls, gain 300 move speed. Casting a spell or attacking will end this effect.

223009.name: Boots of Swiftness
223009.description: The strength of movement slowing effects is reduced by <keyword>40%</keyword>.

223026.name: Guardian Angel
223026.description: <bold><keyword>Saving Grace:</keyword></bold> Upon taking lethal damage, restores <heal>50% base Health</heal> and <mana>100% max Mana</mana> after 4 seconds of stasis. This effect has a one round cooldown.

223032.name: Yun Tal Wildarrows
223032.description:
<bold><keyword>Practice Makes Lethal:</keyword></bold> <keyword>On-Attack</keyword>, gain <crit>Critical Strike Chance</crit> permanently up to 25%.
<bold><keyword>Flurry:</keyword></bold> <keyword>On-Attacking</keyword> an enemy champion, gain 30% Attack Speed for 6 seconds (30 second cooldown).
Attacks reduce this cooldown by 1 second, increased to 2 seconds for <crit>Critical Strikes</crit>.

223033.name: Mortal Reminder
223033.description:
<bold><keyword>Sepsis:</keyword></bold> Dealing physical damage applies <bold>40% Grievous Wounds</bold> to enemy champions for 3 seconds.

<keyword>If an enemy heals for more than 60% of their <health>maximum health</health> while continously affected by <bold>Grievous Wounds</bold>, it is increased to <bold>80% Grievous Wounds</bold>.</keyword> <italic><bold>Grievous Wounds</bold> reduces the effectiveness of <keyword>Healing</keyword> and Regeneration effects.</italic>

223039.name: Atma's Reckoning
223039.description: <bold><keyword>Big Hands:</keyword></bold> Gain 0-30% <crit>Critical Strike Chance</crit>, scaling with your <health>bonus Health</health>.

223047.name: Plated Steelcaps
223047.description: Reduces incoming damage from Attacks by <keyword>14%</keyword>.

223050.name: Zeke's Convergence
223050.description: <bold><keyword>Frostfire Tempest:</keyword></bold> Casting your Ultimate summons a storm around you for 5 seconds. The storm deals <magic> magic damage</magic> per second to enemy champions and <keyword>Slows</keyword> them by 30%.

223053.name: Sterak's Gage
223053.description:
<bold><keyword>The Claws that Catch:</keyword></bold> Gain <ad> bonus Attack Damage</ad>.
<bold><keyword>Lifeline:</keyword></bold> Upon taking damage that would reduce your Health below 30%, gain a <shield> Shield</shield> decaying over 4.5 seconds.

223065.name: Spirit Visage
223065.description: <bold><keyword>Boundless Vitality:</keyword></bold> Increases all <keyword>Healing</keyword> and <keyword>Shielding</keyword> effectiveness on you by 30%.

223068.name: Sunfire Aegis
223068.description: <bold><keyword>Immolate:</keyword></bold> After taking or dealing damage, deal <magic> magic damage</magic> per second to nearby enemies for 3 seconds.

223071.name: Black Cleaver
223071.description:
<bold><keyword>Carve:</keyword></bold> Dealing <ad-bonus>physical damage</ad-bonus> to champions applies a stack of <armor>6% Armor reduction</armor> for 6 seconds, up to <armor>30% Armor reduction</armor>.
<bold><keyword>Fervor:</keyword></bold> Dealing <ad-bonus>physical damage</ad-bonus> grants <ms>20 Move Speed</ms> for 2 seconds.

223072.name: Bloodthirster
223072.description: <bold><keyword>Ichorshield:</keyword></bold> Convert excess <keyword>healing</keyword> from your Lifesteal to a Shield.

223073.name: Experimental Hexplate
223073.description:
<bold><keyword>Hexcharged:</keyword></bold> Gain 30 Ultimate Ability Haste.
<bold><keyword>Overdrive:</keyword></bold> After casting your Ultimate, gain <keyword>50% Attack Speed</keyword> and <ms>20% Move Speed</ms> for 8 seconds.

223074.name: Ravenous Hydra
223074.description:
<keyword>Cleave:</keyword> Attacks and Abilities deal physical damage to other nearby enemies. Activate to hit nearby enemies.
<bold><keyword>Ravenous Crescent:</keyword></bold> Deal <ad-bonus>physical damage</ad-bonus> to enemies around you.
Your Life Steal applies to this damage.

223075.name: Thornmail
223075.description:
<bold><keyword>Thorns:</keyword></bold> When struck by an Attack, deal damage to the attacker and apply 40% <bold>Grievous Wounds</bold> if they are a champion.

<italic><bold>Grievous Wounds</bold> reduces the effectiveness of <keyword>Healing</keyword> and Regeneration effects.</italic>

223078.name: Trinity Force
223078.description:
<bold><keyword>Spellblade:</keyword></bold> After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with additional physical damage.
<bold><keyword>Quicken:</keyword></bold> Basic attacks grant Move Speed.

223084.name: Heartsteel
223084.description:
<bold><keyword>Colossal Consumption:</keyword></bold> Charge up a powerful attack against a champion over time while near them. The charged attack deals bonus physical damage and grants permanent <health>max Health</health>.
<bold><keyword>Goliath:</keyword></bold> Gain increased size based on Total Health.

223085.name: Runaan's Hurricane
223085.description:
<bold><keyword>Wind's Fury:</keyword></bold> When Attacking, bolts are fired at up to 2 enemies near the target. Bolts apply <keyword>On-Hit</keyword> effects and can <crit>Critically Strike</crit>.

<italic>Item is for Ranged champions only.</italic>

223087.name: Statikk Shiv
223087.description:
<bold><keyword>Electrospark:</keyword></bold> Attacks trigger chain lightning <keyword>On-Hit</keyword>, dealing <magic>magic damage</magic> with a cooldown.
<bold><keyword>Electroshock:</keyword></bold> Takedowns within 3 seconds of damaging the target reset Electrospark's cooldown.

223089.name: Rabadon's Deathcap
223089.description: <bold><keyword>Magical Opus:</keyword></bold> Increases your total <ap>Ability Power by 30%</ap>.

223091.name: Wit's End
223091.description: • <keyword>Fray:</keyword> Attacks apply magic damage <keyword>On-Hit</keyword> and grant Move Speed.

223094.name: Rapid Firecannon

<bold><keyword>Energized:</keyword></bold> Moving and Attacking generates an <keyword>Energized Attack</keyword>.
<bold><keyword>Sharpshooter:</keyword></bold> Your <keyword>Energized Attack</keyword> applies <magic>200 bonus magic damage</magic>. In addition, Energized attacks gain up to 35% bonus Attack Range.

<keyword>Energized stacks twice as fast in Arena.</keyword>

223095.name: Stormrazor
223095.description:
<bold><keyword>Energized:</keyword></bold> Moving and Attacking generates an <keyword>Energized Attack</keyword>.
<bold><keyword>Bolt:</keyword></bold> Your <keyword>Energized Attack</keyword> applies <magic> bonus magic damage</magic> and grants <ms>45% Move Speed</ms> for 1.5s.

<keyword>Energized stacks twice as fast in Arena.</keyword>

223100.name: Lich Bane
223100.description: <bold><keyword>Spellblade:</keyword></bold> After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional <magic> magic damage</magic> <keyword>On-Hit</keyword>.

<bold><keyword>Annul:</keyword></bold> Grants a Spell Shield that blocks the next enemy Ability.

<italic>Item cooldown is restarted if you take damage from champions before it is completed.</italic>

223107.name: Redemption

(0s)
<bold><keyword>Intervention:</keyword></bold> Target an area within. After 2.5 seconds, call down a beam of light to restore Health to allies and damage enemy champions.

<bold><keyword>Sacrifice:</keyword></bold> While near your <keyword>Worthy</keyword> ally, take 12% of the damage they receive and <heal>heal</heal> for 10% of the damage they deal to Champions.

(0s)

223116.name: Rylai's Crystal Scepter

223119.name: Winter's Approach
223119.description:
• <keyword>Awe:</keyword> Gain bonus <health>Health equal to Total Mana</health>.
• <keyword>Mana Charge:</keyword> <keyword>After 2 combat rounds</keyword>, this item transforms into <keyword>Fimbulwinter</keyword>.

223124.name: Guinsoo's Rageblade

Attacks apply <magic>30 magic damage <keyword>On-Hit</keyword></magic>.
<bold><keyword>Seething Strike:</keyword></bold> Basic attacks grant <keyword>8% Attack Speed</keyword>, stacking up to 4 times for a maximum of <keyword> Attack Speed</keyword>. While fully stacked, every third Attack applies your <keyword>On-Hit</keyword> effects twice.

223137.name: Cryptbloom
223137.description: <bold><keyword>Life from Death:</keyword></bold> When a champion that you damaged within 3 seconds dies, a nova spreads from their corpse that <heal>heals</heal>.

223139.name: Mercurial Scimitar
223139.description: <bold><keyword>Quicksilver:</keyword></bold> Remove all crowd control debuffs and gain Move Speed.

223142.name: Youmuu's Ghostblade
223142.description:
<bold><keyword>Haunt:</keyword></bold> Gain <ms> Move Speed</ms> while out of combat.

(0s)
<bold><keyword>Wraith Step:</keyword></bold> Gain Move Speed and Ghosting.

223143.name: Randuin's Omen
223143.description:
<bold><keyword>Resilience:</keyword></bold> <crit>Critical Strikes</crit> deal 30% less damage to you.
<bold><keyword>Humility:</keyword></bold> <bold>Slow</bold> nearby enemies.

(0s)
<bold><keyword>Humility:</keyword></bold> Briefly <keyword>Slow</keyword> nearby enemies by 70% for 2 seconds.

223146.name: Hextech Gunblade
223146.description:
(0s)
<bold><keyword>Lightning Bolt:</keyword></bold> Shocks the target enemy champion, dealing <magic> magic damage</magic> and slowing them by 25% for 1.5 seconds.

223152.name: Hextech Rocketbelt
223152.description: <bold><keyword>Supersonic:</keyword></bold> Dash in target direction, unleashing an arc of magic missiles that deal damage.

223153.name: Blade of The Ruined King

<bold><keyword>Mist's Edge:</keyword></bold> Attacks apply an additional enemy current Health physical damage <keyword>On-Hit</keyword>.
<bold><keyword>Clawing Shadows:</keyword></bold> Attacking a champion 3 times Slows them.

223156.name: Maw of Malmortius
223156.description: <bold><keyword>Lifeline:</keyword></bold> Upon taking magic damage that would reduce Health below 30%, gain a magic damage Shield. When <keyword>Lifeline</keyword> triggers, gain Omnivamp until the end of combat.

223157.name: Zhonya's Hourglass
223157.description: <bold><keyword>Stasis:</keyword></bold> You become <bold>Invulnerable</bold> and <bold>Untargetable</bold> for 2.5 seconds, but are prevented from taking any other actions during this time <keyword>(120s)</keyword>.

223161.name: Spear of Shojin
223161.description:
<bold><keyword>Dragonforce:</keyword></bold> Gain 25 Basic Ability Haste.
<bold><keyword>Focused Will:</keyword></bold> Dealing damage with Abilities increases your Champion's Ability and Passive damage by 3% for 6 seconds. (stacks 4 times).

223165.name: Morellonomicon
223165.description:
<bold><keyword>Affliction:</keyword></bold> Dealing magic damage applies <bold>40% Grievous Wounds</bold> to enemy champions for 3 seconds.

<keyword>If an enemy heals for more than 60% of their <health>maximum health</health> while continously affected by <bold>Grievous Wounds</bold>, it is increased to <bold>80% Grievous Wounds</bold>.</keyword> <italic><bold>Grievous Wounds</bold> reduces the effectiveness of <keyword>Healing</keyword> and Regeneration effects.</italic>

223172.name: Zephyr
223172.description:
<bold><keyword>Like the Wind:</keyword></bold> Gain 5% Move Speed <keyword>On-Hit</keyword> for 6 seconds, stacking up to 25% Move Speed.

<italic>Tenacity reduces the duration of <bold>Stun</bold>, <bold>Slow</bold>, <bold>Taunt</bold>, <bold>Fear</bold>, <bold>Silence</bold>, <bold>Blind</bold>, <bold>Polymorph</bold> and <bold>Immobilizing</bold> effects. It has no effect on <bold>Airborne</bold> or <bold>Suppression</bold>.</italic>

223181.name: Hullbreaker
223181.description:
<bold><keyword>Skipper:</keyword></bold> Every fifth Attack against champions and epic monsters deals <ad-bonus> bonus physical damage</ad-bonus>, increased to <ad-bonus></ad-bonus> against structures.
<bold><keyword>Solo Party:</keyword></bold> While no allied champions are within 1500 range, you gain <armor>Armor</armor> and <mr>Magic Resist</mr>.

223185.name: Guardian's Dirk
223185.description: <bold><keyword>Agricultural Reaper:</keyword></bold> Increases effects of Power Flower by 20%. Gain 100 Move speed for 3s after attacking a plant.

223190.name: Locket of the Iron Solari
223190.description: <bold><keyword>Devotion:</keyword></bold> Grant nearby allies a <shield>Shield</shield>, decaying over time.

223222.name: Mikael's Blessing
223222.description:
(0s)
<bold><keyword>Purify:</keyword></bold> Restore Health and Remove all crowd control debuffs (except <bold>Knockups</bold> and <bold>Suppression</bold>) from an ally champion.

223302.name: Terminus
223302.description:
<bold><keyword>Shadow:</keyword></bold> Attacks deal <magic>30 bonus magic damage</magic> <keyword>On-Hit</keyword>.
<bold><keyword>Juxtaposition:</keyword></bold> Alternate between <keyword>Light</keyword> and <keyword>Dark</keyword> Attacks against champions:
• <keyword>Light</keyword> Attacks grant <armor>Armor</armor> and <mr>Magic Resist</mr> for 5s.
• <keyword>Dark</keyword> Attacks grant 8% <armor>Armor Penetration</armor> and <mr>Magic Penetration</mr> for 5s.

223504.name: Ardent Censer
223504.description: <bold><keyword>Sanctify:</keyword></bold> <keyword>Healing</keyword> or <keyword>Shielding</keyword> another ally enhances you both for 6 seconds, granting your Attacks <keyword>40%</keyword> Attack Speed and <magic>25 magic damage</magic> <keyword>On-Hit</keyword>.

223508.name: Essence Reaver
223508.description: <bold><keyword>Spellblade:</keyword></bold> After using an Ability, your next Attack deals <ad-bonus>bonus physical damage</ad-bonus> and grants <mana>Mana</mana> <keyword>On-Hit</keyword>.

223742.name: Dead Man's Plate
223742.description:
<bold><keyword>Shipwrecker:</keyword></bold> While moving, build up Move Speed. Your next Attack discharges built up Move Speed to deal damage. If dealt by a Melee champion at top speed, the Attack also <bold>Slows</bold> the target.
<bold><keyword>Unsinkable:</keyword></bold> The strength of movement slowing effects is reduced.

223748.name: Titanic Hydra
223748.description:
• <keyword>Colossus:</keyword> Gain bonus <ad>Attack Damage based off of <health>bonus Health</health></ad>.
• <keyword>Cleave:</keyword> Attacks apply additional damage <keyword>On-Hit</keyword>, creating a shockwave that deals damage to enemies behind the target. <bold><keyword>Titanic Crescent:</keyword></bold> Empower your next <keyword>Cleave</keyword> to deal <ad-bonus>bonus physical damage</ad-bonus> <keyword>On-Hit</keyword> and deal <ad-bonus>bonus physical damage</ad-bonus> to enemies behind the target.

223814.name: Edge of Night
223814.description:
<bold><keyword>Annul:</keyword></bold> Gain a Spell Shield that blocks the next enemy Ability.

<italic>Item's cooldown is restarted if you take damage before it is completed.</italic>

224004.name: Spectral Cutlass
224004.description: <bold><keyword>Soul Anchor:</keyword></bold> Mark your current location. After 5 seconds, return to that location. You may recast at any point during <bold><keyword>Soul Anchor's</keyword></bold> duration to return to your marked location early.

224005.name: Imperial Mandate
224005.description: <bold><keyword>Coordinated Fire:</keyword></bold> <keyword>Slowing</keyword> or <keyword>Immobilizing</keyword> an enemy champion marks them for 5 seconds. Ally champion damage detonates the mark, dealing <magic>magic damage equal to 20% of current health</magic>.

224401.name: Force of Nature
224401.description:
<bold><keyword>Absorb:</keyword></bold> Taking <magic>magic damage</magic> from enemy Champions grants a stack of <keyword>Steadfast</keyword> (max 10) for 7 seconds. Enemy <bold>Immobilizing</bold> effects grant an additional 2 stacks.
<bold><keyword>Dissipate:</keyword></bold> While at 10 stacks of <keyword>Steadfast</keyword>, gain <mr>50 Magic Resist</mr> and 14% increased Move Speed.

<italic>One spell can add a new stack of <keyword>Steadfast</keyword> every 1 second.</italic>

224403.name: The Golden Spatula
224403.description:
<bold><keyword>Doing Something:</keyword></bold> You are permanently On Fire!

<italic>"It must do something...
Declined, it does EVERYTHING"</italic>

224628.name: Horizon Focus
224628.description:
<bold><keyword>Hypershot:</keyword></bold> Dealing Ability damage to champions at 600 range or greater <keyword>Reveals</keyword> them for 6 seconds.
<bold><keyword>Focus:</keyword></bold> When <keyword>Hypershot</keyword> is triggered, <keyword>Reveal</keyword> all other enemy champions within 1400 range of them for 3 seconds.

224629.name: Cosmic Drive
224629.description: <bold><keyword>Spelldance:</keyword></bold> Dealing <magic>magic</magic> or <true>true damage</true> to champions grants <ms> Move Speed</ms> for 4 seconds.

224633.name: Riftmaker
224633.description:
<bold><keyword>Void Corruption:</keyword></bold> For each second in combat with enemy champions, deal 2% bonus damage, up to 8%. At maximum strength, gain <vamp>Omnivamp</vamp>.
<bold><keyword>Void Infusion:</keyword></bold> Gain 2% of your <health>bonus Health</health> as <ap>Ability Power</ap>.

224645.name: Shadowflame
224645.description: <bold><keyword>Cinderbloom:</keyword></bold> <magic>Magic</magic> and <true>true damage</true> <keyword>Critically Strikes</keyword> enemies below 40% Health, dealing 15% increased damage.

224646.name: Stormsurge
224646.description:
<bold><keyword>Stormraider:</keyword></bold> Dealing 25% of a champion's <health>maximum Health</health> within 2.5s applies <keyword>Squall</keyword> to them and grants <ms>25% Move Speed</ms> for 1.5 seconds.
<bold><keyword>Squall:</keyword></bold> After 2 seconds, deal <magic>magic damage</magic>. If the target dies before <keyword>Squall</keyword> triggers, it damages nearby enemies and you gain <ms>25% Move Speed</ms> for 1.5 seconds.

226333.name: Death's Dance
226333.description:
<bold><keyword>Ignore Pain:</keyword></bold> Damage taken is dealt to you over time instead.
<bold><keyword>Defy:</keyword></bold> Champion takedowns cleanse <keyword>Ignore Pain's</keyword> remaining damage pool and restore Health over time.

226609.name: Chempunk Chainsword
226609.description:
<bold><keyword>Hackshorn:</keyword></bold> Dealing physical damage applies 40% <bold>Grievous Wounds</bold> to enemy champions for 3 seconds.

<keyword>If an enemy heals for more than 60% of their <health>maximum health</health> while continously affected by <bold>Grievous Wounds</bold>, it is increased to <bold>80% Grievous Wounds</bold>.</keyword> <italic><bold>Grievous Wounds</bold> reduces the effectiveness of <keyword>Healing</keyword> and Regeneration effects.</italic>

226610.name: Sundered Sky
226610.description: <bold><keyword>Lightshield Strike:</keyword></bold> Your first Attack against a champion <keyword>Critically Strikes</keyword> and <heal>restores Health</heal>.

226616.name: Staff of Flowing Water
226616.description: <bold><keyword>Rapids:</keyword></bold> <keyword>Healing</keyword> or <keyword>Shielding</keyword> an ally grants you both <magic> Ability Power</magic> for 4 seconds.

226617.name: Moonstone Renewer
226617.description: <bold><keyword>Starlit Grace:</keyword></bold> <heal>Healing or <keyword>shielding</keyword></heal> yourself or an ally chains to the other champion, <keyword>healing</keyword> <heal>20%</heal> or <keyword>shielding</keyword> <shield>25%</shield> of the original amount.

226620.name: Echoes of Helia
226620.description: • <keyword>Soul Siphon:</keyword> Damaging a champion grants a <keyword>Soul Shard</keyword>. <keyword>Healing</keyword> or <keyword>Shielding</keyword> an ally consumes all <keyword>Soul Shards</keyword> to restore Health and deals magic damage per Shard to the nearest enemy champion.

226621.name: Dawncore
226621.description: <bold><keyword>First Light:</keyword></bold> Gain <heal>3% Heal and Shield Power</heal> and <ap>10 Ability Power</ap> per 100% Base Mana Regen.

226630.name: Goredrinker
226630.description: <bold><keyword>Thirsting Slash:</keyword></bold> Deal damage to nearby enemies. Restore Health for each champion hit.

226631.name: Stridebreaker
226631.description:
<bold><keyword>Cleave:</keyword></bold> Attacks deal <ad-bonus>physical damage</ad-bonus> to nearby enemies.
<bold><keyword>Breaking Shockwave:</keyword></bold> Deal <ad-bonus>physical damage</ad-bonus> and <bold>Slow</bold> nearby enemies by 40%.
Gain <ms>40% decaying Move Speed</ms> per champion hit for 3 seconds.

226653.name: Liandry's Anguish
226653.description:
<bold><keyword>Torment:</keyword></bold> Damaging Abilities <keyword>Burn</keyword> enemies for <magic>2% <health>max Health</health> magic damage</magic> per second for 3 seconds.
<bold><keyword>Suffering:</keyword></bold> For each second in combat with enemy champions, deal 2% bonus damage, up to 6%.

226655.name: Luden's Echo
226655.description: <bold><keyword>Echo:</keyword></bold> Damaging Abilities consume all the charges to deal an additional magic damage to the target and one additional nearby target per charge. If there are insufficient targets in range, for each remaining shot, repeat the damage on the primary target.

226657.name: Rod of Ages
226657.description:
<bold><keyword>Timeless:</keyword></bold> <keyword>After 2 combat rounds</keyword>, this item gains an additional <magic>50 Ability Power</magic>, <health>300 Health</health>, and <mana>400 Mana</mana>, and you gain a level.
<bold><keyword>Eternity:</keyword></bold> Taking damage from champions restores 7% of premitigation damage as <mana>Mana</mana>. Casting an ability heals for 25% of <mana>Mana</mana> spent, up to <health>20 Health</health> per cast, per second.

226662.name: Iceborn Gauntlet
226662.description: <bold><keyword>Spellblade:</keyword></bold> After using an Ability, your next Attack deals <ad-bonus>bonus physical damage</ad-bonus> <keyword>On-Hit</keyword> and creates a frost field for 2s that <bold>Slows</bold>.

226664.name: Hollow Radiance
226664.description:
<bold><keyword>Immolate:</keyword></bold> After taking or dealing damage, deal <magic>magic damage</magic> per second to nearby enemies for 3 seconds.
<bold><keyword>Desolate:</keyword></bold> Killing an enemy deals <magic>magic damage</magic> around them.

226665.name: Jak'Sho, The Protean
226665.description: <bold><keyword>Voidborn Resilience:</keyword></bold> After 5 seconds of champion combat, increase your bonus <armor>Armor</armor> and <mr>Magic Resist</mr> by 40% until end of combat.

226672.name: Kraken Slayer
226672.description: <bold><keyword>Bring It Down:</keyword></bold> Every third Attack deals <ad-bonus>bonus physical damage</ad-bonus> <keyword>On-Hit</keyword>, increased based on their missing Health.

226673.name: Immortal Shieldbow
226673.description: <bold><keyword>Lifeline:</keyword></bold> Taking damage that would reduce your Health below 30% grants a <shield>Shield</shield> for 3 seconds.

226675.name: Navori Flickerblades
226675.description: <bold><keyword>Transcendence:</keyword></bold> Your Attacks reduce your non-Ultimate Ability cooldowns by <keyword>15%</keyword> of their remaining cooldown.

226676.name: The Collector
226676.description:
<bold><keyword>Death:</keyword></bold> Your damage executes champions that are below 5% Health.
<bold><keyword>Taxes:</keyword></bold> Champion kills grant <gold>125 bonus gold</gold>.

226692.name: Eclipse
226692.description: <bold><keyword>Ever Rising Moon:</keyword></bold> Hitting a champion with 2 separate Attacks or Abilities within 2 seconds grants you a <shield>Shield</shield> for 2 seconds.

226693.name: Prowler's Claw
226693.description: <bold><keyword>Sandswipe:</keyword></bold> Dash through target enemy, dealing a part of the target's <health>maximum Health</health> as <ad-bonus>bonus Physical Damage</ad-bonus>. For the next 3 seconds, you deal increased damage to the target.

226694.name: Serylda's Grudge
226694.description: <bold><keyword>Bitter Cold:</keyword></bold> Damaging Abilities <bold>Slow</bold> enemies below 50% Health by 30% for 1 second.

226695.name: Serpent's Fang
226695.description:
<bold><keyword>Shield Reaver:</keyword></bold> Dealing damage to an enemy champion reduces any shields they gain. When you damage an enemy who is unaffected by Shield Reaver, reduce all shields on them.

Item performance differs for melee and ranged users.

226697.name: Hubris
226697.description: <bold><keyword>Eminence:</keyword></bold> When a champion that you have damaged with the last 3 seconds dies, gain <ad-bonus>15 Attack Damage</ad-bonus> <keyword>for the rest of the round</keyword>, or until slain. Eminence's <ad-bonus>Attack Damage is permanently increased by 2</ad-bonus> each time this triggers.

226698.name: Profane Hydra
226698.description:
<bold><keyword>Cleave:</keyword></bold> Attacks deal <ad-bonus>physical damage</ad-bonus> to nearby enemies.
<bold><keyword>Heretical Cleave:</keyword></bold> Deal <ad-bonus> physical damage</ad-bonus> around you.

226699.name: Voltaic Cyclosword
226699.description:
<bold><keyword>Galvanize:</keyword></bold> Dashes and Stealth stack <keyword>Energized</keyword> 75% faster.
<bold><keyword>Firmament:</keyword></bold> Your <keyword>Energized Attack</keyword> deals <ad-bonus>bonus physical damage</ad-bonus> and <keyword>Slows</keyword> for 0.75 seconds.

226701.name: Opportunity
226701.description:
<bold><keyword>Preparation:</keyword></bold> After being out of combat with Champions for 8 seconds gain <ad>Lethality</ad>. This Lethality lasts for 3 seconds after dealing damage to champions.
<bold><keyword>Extraction:</keyword></bold> When a champion that you damaged within 3 seconds dies, gain <ms>200 decaying Move Speed</ms> for 1.5 seconds.

228001.name: Anathema's Chains
228001.description:
<bold><keyword>Vendetta:</keyword></bold> Take reduced damage against your Nemesis. They have reduced Tenacity while near you.

<italic>Active can be cast at global range.</italic>

<italic>"She swore to dedicate her life to his destruction..."</italic> <bold><keyword>Vow:</keyword></bold> Choose a Nemesis (90s).

228002.name: Wooglet's Witchcap
228002.description:
<bold><keyword>Magical Opus:</keyword></bold> Increases your total <ap>Ability Power by 50%</ap>.

<bold>Requires Augment: <keyword>Quest: Wooglet's Witchcap</keyword></bold>
<bold><keyword>Time Stop:</keyword></bold> Enter <keyword>Stasis</keyword> for 2.5 seconds.

228009.name: Multitool
228009.description: Molds into another item each Shopping Phase.

228020.name: Abyssal Mask
228020.description: <bold><keyword>Unmake:</keyword></bold> Nearby enemy champions take 12% more <magic>magic damage</magic>.

322065.name: Shurelya's Battlesong
322065.description: <bold><keyword>Inspiring Speech:</keyword></bold> Grant nearby allies <ms>30% Move Speed</ms> for 4 seconds.

322526.name: Whispering Circlet
322526.description:
<bold><keyword>Harmony:</keyword></bold> Gain % Heal and Shield Power.
<bold><keyword>Manaflow:</keyword></bold> Landing Abilities grants <mana>4 max Mana</mana> (doubled vs. champions).
Transforms into <keyword>Diadem of Songs</keyword> at <mana>360 max Mana</mana>.

322530.name: Diadem of Songs
322530.description:
<bold><keyword>Harmony:</keyword></bold> Gain % Heal and Shield Power.
<bold><keyword>Consonance:</keyword></bold> While you or any ally you've healed or shielded in the last 3 seconds is in combat with champions, each second, heal the lowest health nearby ally champion.

323002.name: Trailblazer
323002.description:
<bold><keyword>Lead the Way:</keyword></bold> While moving, build up to <ms>20 bonus Move Speed</ms>.
At max speed:
• Create a trail that grants allied champions <ms>Move Speed equal to 15%</ms> of yours.
• If you are Melee, your next Attack <keyword>Slows</keyword> the target by 50% for 1 second.

323003.name: Archangel's Staff
323003.description:
<bold><keyword>Awe:</keyword></bold> Gain Ability Power equal to <mana>1% bonus Mana.</mana>
<bold><keyword>Manaflow:</keyword></bold> Landing Abilities grants <mana>9.5 max Mana</mana> (doubled vs. champions).
Transforms into <keyword>Seraph's Embrace</keyword> at <mana>360 max Mana</mana>.

323004.name: Manamune
323004.description:
<bold><keyword>Awe:</keyword></bold> Gain <ad> bonus Attack Damage</ad>.
<bold><keyword>Manaflow:</keyword></bold> Landing Attacks and Abilities grants <mana>6.5 max Mana</mana> (doubled vs. champions).
Transforms into <keyword>Muramana</keyword> at <mana>360 max Mana</mana>.

323040.name: Seraph's Embrace
323040.description:
<bold><keyword>Awe:</keyword></bold> Gain <ap> Ability Power</ap>.
<bold><keyword>Lifeline:</keyword></bold> Taking damage that would reduce your Health below 30% grants a <shield> Shield</shield> for 3 seconds.

323042.name: Muramana
323042.description:
<bold><keyword>Awe:</keyword></bold> Gain <ad>2% max Mana as bonus Attack Damage</ad>.
<bold><keyword>Shock:</keyword></bold> Attacks against champions deal <ad-bonus>1.2% max Mana as bonus physical damage</ad-bonus> <keyword>On-Hit</keyword>.
Damaging Abilities against champions deal <ad-bonus>3% - 4% max Mana as bonus physical damage</ad-bonus>.

323050.name: Zeke's Convergence
323050.description: <bold><keyword>Frostfire Tempest:</keyword></bold> Casting your Ultimate summons a storm around you for 5 seconds. The storm deals <magic>30 magic damage</magic> per second to enemy champions and <keyword>Slows</keyword> them by 30%.

323070.name: Tear of the Goddess
323070.description:
<bold><keyword>Manaflow:</keyword></bold> Landing Abilities grants <mana>6.5 max Mana</mana> (doubled vs. champions), up to <mana>360</mana>.
<bold><keyword>Helping Hand:</keyword></bold> Attacks deal an additional <ad-bonus>5 physical damage</ad-bonus> to minions.

323075.name: Thornmail
323075.description: <bold><keyword>Thorns:</keyword></bold> When struck by an Attack, deal <magic>magic damage</magic> to the attacker and apply 40% <keyword>Grievous Wounds</keyword> for 3 seconds if they are a champion.

323107.name: Redemption
323107.description: <bold><keyword>Intervention:</keyword></bold> Restore <heal>150 - 350 Health</heal> to allied units and deal <true>10% <health>max Health</health> true damage</true> to enemy champions after 2.5 seconds.

323109.name: Knight's Vow
323109.description: <bold><keyword>Sacrifice:</keyword></bold> While near your <keyword>Worthy</keyword> ally, take 12% of the damage they receive and <heal>heal for 10%</heal> of the damage they deal to champions. <bold><keyword>Pledge:</keyword></bold> Designate an ally as <keyword>Worthy</keyword>.

323110.name: Frozen Heart
323110.description: <bold><keyword>Winter's Caress:</keyword></bold> Reduce the <keyword>Attack Speed</keyword> of nearby champions by <keyword>20%</keyword>.

323119.name: Winter's Approach
323119.description:
<bold><keyword>Awe:</keyword></bold> Gain <health> Health</health>.
<bold><keyword>Manaflow:</keyword></bold> Landing Attacks and Abilities grant <mana>6.5 max Mana</mana> (doubled vs. champions).
Transforms into <keyword>Fimbulwinter</keyword> at <mana>360 max Mana</mana>.

323121.name: Fimbulwinter
323121.description:
<bold><keyword>Awe:</keyword></bold> Gain <health> Health</health>.
<bold><keyword>Everlasting:</keyword></bold> <keyword>Immobilizing</keyword> or <keyword>Slowing</keyword> ( Melee only) an enemy champion grants a <shield>Shield</shield> for 3 seconds.
The Shield is increased by 80% if more than one enemy is nearby.

323190.name: Locket of the Iron Solari
323190.description: <bold><keyword>Devotion:</keyword></bold> Grant nearby allies a <shield>200 - 360 Shield</shield> that decays over 2.5 seconds.

323222.name: Mikael's Blessing
323222.description: <bold><keyword>Purify:</keyword></bold> Remove all crowd control debuffs (excluding <keyword>Airborne</keyword> and <keyword>Suppression</keyword>) from an ally champion and restore <heal>100 - 250 Health</heal>.

323504.name: Ardent Censer
323504.description: <bold><keyword>Sanctify:</keyword></bold> <keyword>Healing</keyword> or <keyword>Shielding</keyword> an ally enhances you both for 6 seconds, granting <keyword>25% Attack Speed</keyword> and <magic>20 magic damage</magic> <keyword>On-Hit</keyword>.

324005.name: Imperial Mandate
324005.description: <bold><keyword>Coordinated Fire:</keyword></bold> <keyword>Slowing</keyword> or <keyword>Immobilizing</keyword> an enemy champion marks them for 5 seconds. Ally champion damage detonates the mark, dealing <magic>magic damage equal to 10% of current health</magic>.

326616.name: Staff of Flowing Water
326616.description: <bold><keyword>Rapids:</keyword></bold> <keyword>Healing</keyword> or <keyword>Shielding</keyword> an ally grants you both <magic>45 Ability Power</magic> for 6 seconds.

326617.name: Moonstone Renewer
326617.description: <bold><keyword>Starlit Grace:</keyword></bold> <keyword>Healing</keyword> or <keyword>shielding</keyword> an ally chains the effect to another ally (excluding yourself), <heal>healing 30%</heal> or <shield>shielding 35%</shield> of the original amount.

326620.name: Echoes of Helia
326620.description: <bold><keyword>Soul Siphon:</keyword></bold> Gain 35% of pre-mitigation damage dealt to champions as Soul Charges. <keyword>Healing</keyword> or <keyword>Shielding</keyword> an ally consumes all <keyword>Soul Charges</keyword> to restore <heal>Health</heal>.

326621.name: Dawncore
326621.description: <bold><keyword>First Light:</keyword></bold> Gain <heal>2% Heal and Shield Power</heal> and <ap>10 Ability Power</ap> per 100% Base Mana Regen.

326657.name: Rod of Ages
326657.description:
<bold><keyword>Timeless:</keyword></bold> This item gains <health>10 Health</health>, <mana>30 Mana</mana> and <ap>3 Ability Power</ap> every 60 seconds up to 10 times. Upon reaching max stacks, gain a level.
<bold><keyword>Eternity:</keyword></bold> Taking damage from champions restores <mana>10%</mana> of the damage as <mana>Mana</mana>.
Casting an ability <heal>heals for 25%</heal> of Mana spent.

328020.name: Abyssal Mask
328020.description: <bold><keyword>Unmake:</keyword></bold> Nearby enemy champions take 12% more <magic>magic damage</magic>.

443054.name: Darksteel Talons
443054.description: <bold><keyword>Gash:</keyword></bold> Attacks apply true damage on hit.

443055.name: Fulmination
443055.description:
<bold><keyword>Polarity:</keyword></bold> On Attack, if the target is different from the target you most recently triggered an <keyword>Energized Attack</keyword> on, ready Energize.
<bold><keyword>Dynamo:</keyword></bold> <keyword>Energized Attacks</keyword> deal an additional magic damage based on the <magic>Target's Current Health</magic>.

443056.name: Demon King's Crown
443056.description: <bold><keyword>Supremacy:</keyword></bold> Increases your Health, Armor, Magic Resist, Attack Damage, Ability Power, Attack Speed, and Ability Haste by 26%, increased by 0% per round win and -3% each round lost after acquiring this item.

443058.name: Shield of Molten Stone
443058.description: <bold><keyword>Immovable as the Earth:</keyword></bold> Increase your armor by 20%, and gain Block Chance based on your Armor.

443059.name: Cloak of Starry Night
443059.description: <bold><keyword>Limitless as the Stars:</keyword></bold> Increase your <mr>Magic Resist</mr> by 20%. Reduce all damage you take from non-Basic Attack sources by a percentage, scaling with your <mr>Magic Resist</mr> up to a cap of 50%.

443060.name: Sword of the Divine
443060.description: <bold><keyword>Excoriate:</keyword></bold> Each <crit>Critical strike</crit> deals random <keyword>bonus <crit>Critical Strike Damage</crit></keyword>, scaling up to 50% of your <crit>Critical Strike Chance</crit>.

443061.name: Force Of Entropy
443061.description: <bold><keyword>Atrophy:</keyword></bold> Immobilizing Crowd Control effects you apply roll your <keyword>Critical Chance</keyword> to increase their duration by 0.25 +33% seconds.

443062.name: Sanguine Gift
443062.description: <bold><keyword>Patronage:</keyword></bold> Store 15% of the total damage you've dealt to enemies. Whenever this exceeds 333, consume it to heal yourself and your nearest ally for that amount.

443063.name: Eleisa's Miracle
443063.description: <bold><keyword>Enduring Vitality:</keyword></bold> Gain + 2.5% Heal and Shield Power per 100 Missing Health, up to 60%.

443064.name: Talisman Of Ascension
443064.description:
<keyword> ?</keyword> Attack Damage
<keyword> ?</keyword> Attack Speed
<keyword> ?</keyword> <crit>Critical Strike Chance</crit>
<keyword> ?</keyword> <crit>Critical Strike Damage</crit>

<keyword> ? </keyword> Ability Power
