<keyword> ?%</keyword> Heal and Shield Power


<bold><keyword>Imbricate</keyword></bold> Re-roll the stats on Talisman of Ascension. Each time you do so, the stats get stronger. Twice Per Round (Thrice with Apex Inventor).

443069.name: Hamstringer
443069.description:
<bold><keyword>Scour:</keyword></bold> On <crit>Critical Strike</crit>:
• Apply a bleed, dealing 25% of the damage done + physical damage on hit over 2 seconds. This effect stacks any number of times.
• Apply a 7% Slow for 2 seconds. This effect stacks up to 35%.

443079.name: Turbo Chemtank
443079.description:
(0s)
<bold><keyword>Supercharged:</keyword></bold> Remove all crowd control debuffs (excluding <bold>Airborne</bold>) and become Unstoppable for 3 seconds.

443080.name: Twin Mask
443080.description: <bold><keyword>Unanimity:</keyword></bold> Gain a percent of your teammate's Health, Armor, Magic Resist, Attack Damage, Ability Power, Attack Speed, and Ability Haste, increased significantly if they also have <keyword>Twin Mask</keyword> and are alive.

443081.name: Hexbolt Companion
443081.description:
<bold><keyword>Covering Fire:</keyword></bold> While near an allied champion, <keyword>On-Hit</keyword> gain a stack of Edict, At 1 stacks, the next time you would apply an <keyword>On-Hit</keyword>, your teammate also fires a bolt at the target, dealing <ad-bonus> physical damage</ad-bonus> and applying their <keyword>On-Hit</keyword> effects.

<keyword>Covering Fire</keyword> cannot trigger other <keyword>Covering Fire</keyword>.

443083.name: Warmog's Armor
443083.description:
<bold><keyword>Warmog's Heart:</keyword></bold> Requires 1350 <health>bonus Health</health>.

Restore <heal> Health</heal> per second. If you have not taken damage within 4 seconds, restore an additional <heal> Health</heal> per second.

443090.name: Reaper's Toll
443090.description:
<bold><keyword>Sow:</keyword></bold> Increase your Attack Speed from all sources by 15%.
<bold><keyword>Reap:</keyword></bold> <keyword>On-Hit</keyword>, deal <true>max Health true damage</true>, and reduce their <health>Max Health</health> by the damage dealt for the rest of the round. Consecutive hits against the same enemy increase this amount by 0.1%.

443193.name: Gargoyle Stoneplate
443193.description: <bold><keyword>Unbreakable:</keyword></bold> Gain a Shield that decays and grow in size.

444636.name: Night Harvester
444636.description:
<bold><keyword>Soulrend:</keyword></bold> Damaging a champion with Attacks or Abilities deals an additional <magic> magic damage</magic> and grants you <ms>40% Move Speed</ms> for 1.5 seconds.

<italic>Damaging a new champion will extend the duration of the Move Speed bonus.</italic>

444637.name: Demonic Embrace
444637.description: <bold><keyword>Sinister Pact:</keyword></bold> Gain +1.5% <ap>Ability Power</ap> and 1.5% Move Speed per 100 Missing Health, up to 45%.

444644.name: Crown of the Shattered Queen
444644.description:
<bold><keyword>Safeguard:</keyword></bold> You are <keyword>Safeguarded</keyword>, reducing incoming champion damage by 50%. <keyword>Safeguard</keyword> persists for 3 seconds after taking champion damage. (0s).

<italic>Item Cooldown is restarted when damage is taken from champions.</italic>

446632.name: Divine Sunderer
446632.description: <bold><keyword>Spellblade:</keyword></bold> After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with additional damage. If the target is a champion, also heal.

446656.name: Everfrost
446656.description:
(0s)
<bold><keyword>Glaciate:</keyword></bold> Deal damage in a cone, <bold>Slowing</bold> enemies hit. Enemies at the center of the cone are <bold>Rooted</bold> instead.

446667.name: Radiant Virtue
446667.description: <bold><keyword>Guiding Light:</keyword></bold> Upon casting your Ultimate you <bold>Transcend</bold>, increasing your <health>Max Health</health> by <health></health> for 9s. While <bold>Transcended</bold>, you and allies within 1200 range of you heal for <health> ()</health> over the duration (0s).

446671.name: Galeforce
446671.description: <bold><keyword>Cloudburst II:</keyword></bold> Dash in target direction over terrain, firing three missiles at the lowest Health enemy near your destination. Deals physical damage, increased against low Health targets.

446691.name: Duskblade of Draktharr
446691.description: <bold><keyword>Nightstalker:</keyword></bold> Your Abilities deal up to an additional percent damage based on the target's missing health. When a champion that you have damaged within the last 3 seconds dies, you become <keyword>Untargetable</keyword> from non-structures for 1.5 seconds (0s).

446693.name: Prowler's Claw
446693.description: <bold><keyword>Sandswipe:</keyword></bold> Dash through target enemy, dealing a part of the target's <health>maximum Health</health> as <ad-bonus>bonus Physical Damage</ad-bonus>. For the next 3 seconds, you deal increased damage to the target.

447100.name: Mirage Blade
447100.description: <bold><keyword>Blur:</keyword></bold> <keyword>On-Hit</keyword> reduce the remaining cooldowns of your <bold>Dash</bold> and <bold>Blink</bold> Abilities by 12% (reduced to 4% for Ultimates).

447101.name: Gambler's Blade
447101.description: <bold><keyword>Money In The Bank:</keyword></bold> Your Attacks and Abilities have a 12% chance to bank between 30 and 245 Gold when they hit an enemy. On Round Win, cash out. On Round Lose, lose 25% of your bank.

447102.name: Reality Fracture
447102.description:
<bold><keyword>ZZ'Rot:</keyword></bold> On Attack or when damaging an enemy with an ability, summon 8 Voidgrubs to Attack the target. Voidgrubs deal <magic> magic damage</magic> and live for up to 3 seconds.

When you die, spawn 6.

447103.name: Hemomancer's Helm
447103.description: <bold><keyword>Scarlet Allegiance:</keyword></bold> Threshold 30% Lifesteal/Omnivamp: Gain <health>500 Max Health</health>. Drain 10% of all damage nearby enemies take.

447104.name: Innervating Locket
447104.description:
<bold><keyword>Fill the Soul:</keyword></bold> Any Ability cast within 800 range grants you a charge.

At 30 charges, gain <shield> Shield</shield>, <ap> Ability Power</ap>, and <ms> Move Speed</ms> for the rest of the round.

447105.name: Empyrean Promise
447105.description:
(0s)
<bold><keyword>Vigilance:</keyword></bold> Teleport to your ally and grant <shield> shield</shield> for 5s when landing. Can be used when Ally is downed.

447106.name: Dragonheart
447106.description:
<bold><keyword>Inner Flame:</keyword></bold> Increases your <health>Health</health>, <armor>Armor</armor>, <mr>Magic Resist</mr>, <ad-bonus>Attack Damage</ad-bonus>, <magic>Ability Power</magic>, <keyword>Attack Speed</keyword>, and Ability Haste by 4% per Dragon Soul you possess.

Every 2 rounds, gain a Dragon Soul.

If you already have every elemental soul and would gain another, an ancient power awakens within...

<italic>When purchased, if it is past round 5, immediately gain 1 soul, plus 1 for every 2 rounds beyond round 5.</italic>

447107.name: Decapitator
447107.description: Attacks and Non-Ultimate Abilities grant stacks. Gain Ultimate Damage and Ultimate Ability Haste per stack.

447108.name: Runecarver
447108.description:
<bold><keyword>Helix:</keyword></bold> Moving, attacking, and dealing damage with an ability grants 30 <keyword>Energized</keyword> stacks and triggers <keyword>Energized Attacks</keyword> if it is ready.
<bold><keyword>Spiral Out:</keyword></bold> On <keyword>Energized Attack</keyword>, gain a <keyword>Rune</keyword> stack for the rest of the round. Then fire a missile at the target for each <keyword>Rune</keyword> stack, dealing <magic> magic damage</magic>.

447109.name: Cruelty
447109.description: <bold><keyword>Watch Them Fall:</keyword></bold> On <bold>Immobilize</bold> or <bold>Grounding</bold> an enemy champion, summon a comet above them. The comet lands after 1 second, dealing additional <magic> magic damage</magic> in the area. This effect has a 6s cooldown per target per spell cast.

447110.name: Moonflair Spellblade
447110.description:
<bold><keyword>Relentless:</keyword></bold> When you use an Ability, reset your auto attack timer and gain <keyword>90% Attack Speed</keyword> for your next 2 Attacks.

When you Attack, reduce your Ability Cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

447111.name: Overlord's Bloodmail
447111.description:
<bold><keyword>Tyranny:</keyword></bold> Gain <ad-bonus> AD</ad-bonus> equal to 3% <health>Bonus HP</health>.
<bold><keyword>Retribution:</keyword></bold> Gain up to <ad-bonus>17.5% increased AD</ad-bonus> based on your percent missing Health.

447112.name: Flesheater
447112.description:
<bold><keyword>Hack the Meat:</keyword></bold> Dealing damage shreds 3 <armor>Armor</armor> and <mr>Magic Resist</mr> for 5 seconds, stacking up to 10 times. Applying stacks has a 1 second cooldown per Ability.
<bold><keyword>Cannibalize:</keyword></bold> On Champion Takedown, Heal yourself and your ally for <health>18% of the Target's Max Health</health>.

447113.name: Detonation Orb
447113.description:
<bold><keyword>The Bomb:</keyword></bold> Ability damage marks the target, storing 20% of the damage dealt (increased to 25% against <keyword>Immobilized</keyword> enemies).

3 seconds after you last damage the target with an ability, detonate the stored damage on them. If at any point the damage is enough to kill the target, detonate immediately.

447114.name: Reverberation
447114.description:
<bold><keyword>Reverberate:</keyword></bold> At combat start gain <health>50 max Health</health> per <keyword>10% bonus Attack Speed</keyword>.
<bold><keyword>Resonate:</keyword></bold> Attacks deal <magic> magic damage <keyword>On-Hit</keyword></magic>.
<bold><keyword>Rumble:</keyword></bold> <bold>Immobilizing</bold> or <bold>Grounding</bold> an enemy champion grants 25 stacks for 10 seconds. While at 100 stacks, <bold>Immobilizing</bold> an enemy champion applies <keyword>On-Hit</keyword> effects 3 times.

447115.name: Regicide
447115.description: <bold><keyword>End the Line:</keyword></bold> At the start of each round, declare the lowest health enemy the <keyword>Regent</keyword>. Getting a takedown on the <keyword>Regent</keyword> grants you a permanent <ad-bonus>10 Attack Damage</ad-bonus> and refreshes your Ultimate's Cooldown.

447116.name: Kinkou Jitte
447116.description: <bold><keyword>Between the Ribs:</keyword></bold> You can see weakpoints in nearby enemy champions. Dealing damage through the weakpoint deals an additional <true> <health>max Health</health> true damage</true> and grants <ms> Move Speed</ms> for 1.5 seconds.

447118.name: Pyromancer's Cloak
447118.description:
<bold><keyword>Spark:</keyword></bold> Attack or Ability hits against an enemy champion <keyword>Burn</keyword> them for <magic> magic damage</magic> over 3 seconds.
<bold><keyword>Cleansing Flame:</keyword></bold> Applying a <keyword>Burn</keyword> to an enemy champion creates a nearby <keyword>Blaze</keyword> for 5 seconds. While in a <keyword>Blaze</keyword>, you gain <ms> Move Speed</ms> and restore <heal> Health</heal> per second, while enemies take <magic> magic damage</magic> per second.

The size and strength of each <keyword>Blaze</keyword> scale the number unique <keyword>Burn</keyword> sources you have.

447119.name: Lightning Rod
447119.description:
<bold><keyword>Call Lightning:</keyword></bold> Every 16 seconds, <keyword>Autocast</keyword> summon a stormcloud above you, which after a brief delay fires a lightning bolt, dealing <magic> plus 10% <health>max Health</health> magic damage</magic> and <bold>Slowing</bold> by 30% for 2 seconds.

If you are struck by the lightning, gain a <shield> Shield</shield> for 2 seconds.
<bold><keyword>Fully Automated:</keyword></bold> Your <keyword>Autocast</keyword> Cooldowns are reduced by 1 seconds and benefit from your Ability Haste.

<italic>Call Lighting has a minimum cooldown of 5 seconds.</italic>

447120.name: Diamond-Tipped Spear
447120.description:
<bold><keyword>Reach Weapon:</keyword></bold> Increase your attack range by 75.
<bold><keyword>Sweet Spot:</keyword></bold> Deal up to 30% increased damage with Attacks and 40% with Abilities based on how far your target is from you. Damage caps at 1000 units.

447121.name: Twilight's Edge
447121.description:
<bold><keyword>The Path Between:</keyword></bold> Threshold 130 bonus AD and 180 AP: Chakram orbit you, dealing continuous damage to enemies they strike.

<keyword>Spirit World</keyword>: Gain <ap>Ability Power</ap> and Ability Haste.
<keyword>Material World</keyword>: Gain <ad-bonus>Attack Damage</ad-bonus> and <keyword>Attack Speed</keyword>.

447122.name: Black Hole Gauntlet
447122.description:
<bold><keyword>Accretion:</keyword></bold> <keyword>On-Hit</keyword>, gain 1 stack of <keyword>Accretion</keyword>, and 5 stacks for <bold>immobilizing</bold> an enemy champion. These stacks last for the rest of the round, up to 50. Each stack increases your size by 2%.

(0s)
<bold><keyword>Dark Star:</keyword></bold> Summon a Black Hole that scales with your size. <slow>Slowing</slow> nearby enemies by 30% while those in the center are pulled closer and take <magic> magic damage each second</magic>, granting you 1 stack of <keyword>Accretion</keyword>. The Black Hole lasts for seconds.

<italic>Increases in size every 10 stacks. </italic>

447123.name: Puppeteer
447123.description:
<bold><keyword>Pull Their Strings:</keyword></bold> Attacking a champion adds a stack for 15 seconds. At 4 stacks, <bold>Berserk</bold> them for 2 seconds. You grant <bold>Berserk</bold> enemies an additional <keyword> Attack Speed</keyword> and <ms>40% Move Speed</ms>. (25 second Cooldown).

<heal>Healing</heal>, <shield>Shielding</shield>, or buffing yourself or an ally with an Ability reduces the Cooldown by 5 seconds.

<italic>If only one enemy is alive, instead <bold>Fear</bold> them for the same duration.</italic>

663039.name: Atma's Reckoning
663039.description: <bold><keyword>Big Hands:</keyword></bold> Gain 0-30% <crit>Critical Strike Chance</crit>, scaling with your <health>bonus Health</health>.

663056.name: Demon King's Crown
663056.description: <bold><keyword>Supremacy:</keyword></bold> Increases your Health, Armor, Magic Resist, Attack Damage, Ability Power, Attack Speed, and Ability Haste by 20%, increased by 0% perTakedown and -3% per Death after acquiring this item.

663058.name: Shield of Molten Stone
663058.description: <bold><keyword>Immovable as the Earth:</keyword></bold> Increase your armor by 20%, and gain Block Chance based on your Armor.

663059.name: Cloak of Starry Night
663059.description: <bold><keyword>Limitless as the Stars:</keyword></bold> Increase your <mr>Magic Resist</mr> by 10%. Reduce all damage you take from non-Basic Attack sources by a percentage, scaling with your <mr>Magic Resist</mr> up to a cap of 25%.

663060.name: Sword of the Divine
663060.description: <bold><keyword>Excoriate:</keyword></bold> Each <crit>Critical strike</crit> deals random <keyword>bonus <crit>Critical Strike Damage</crit></keyword>, scaling up to 50% of your <crit>Critical Strike Chance</crit>.

663064.name: Veigar's Talisman of Ascension
663064.description:
Gain 100% Extra Experience

Offers no stats, and cannot be sold...

...But will be worth it if you reach Level 30.

663146.name: Hextech Gunblade
663146.description:
(0s)
<bold><keyword>Lightning Bolt:</keyword></bold> Shocks the target enemy champion, dealing <magic> magic damage</magic> and slowing them by 40% for 2 seconds.

663172.name: Zephyr
663172.description:
<bold><keyword>Like the Wind:</keyword></bold> Gain 5% Move Speed <keyword>On-Hit</keyword> for 6 seconds, stacking up to 25% Move Speed.

<italic>Tenacity reduces the duration of <bold>Stun</bold>, <bold>Slow</bold>, <bold>Taunt</bold>, <bold>Fear</bold>, <bold>Silence</bold>, <bold>Blind</bold>, <bold>Polymorph</bold> and <bold>Immobilizing</bold> effects. It has no effect on <bold>Airborne</bold> or <bold>Suppression</bold>.</italic>

663193.name: Gargoyle Stoneplate
663193.description: <bold><keyword>Unbreakable:</keyword></bold> Gain a Shield that decays and grow in size.

664011.name: Sword of Blossoming Dawn
664011.description:
<bold><keyword>Effervescence:</keyword></bold> Gain + 1% Attack Speed for every <heal> 1% Heal and Shield Power</heal> you have.
<bold><keyword>Peppermint:</keyword></bold> <keyword>On-Hit</keyword>, <heal>heal the lowest health</heal> ally champion near you for , prioritizing lower health allies.

664644.name: Crown of the Shattered Queen
664644.description:
<bold><keyword>Safeguard:</keyword></bold> You are <keyword>Safeguarded</keyword>, reducing incoming champion damage by 40%. <keyword>Safeguard</keyword> persists for 3 seconds after taking champion damage. (0s).

<italic>Item Cooldown is restarted when damage is taken from champions.</italic>

667101.name: Gambler's Blade
667101.description:
<bold><keyword>Playing for Time:</keyword></bold> Champion takedowns while using Gambler's Blade delays Doom-boss Veigar's arrival by an additional 10 seconds. Deaths while carrying the Blade accelerate it by 10 seconds. (Will not lose time past the 14:30 minute mark)
<bold><keyword>Double Down:</keyword></bold> Champion takedowns grant a stack, each granting<gold> 10 bonus gold</gold> on kill. Also take 5% increased damage per stack. Lose all stacks on death.

667109.name: Cruelty
667109.description: <bold><keyword>Watch Them Fall:</keyword></bold> On <bold>Immobilize</bold> or <bold>Grounding</bold> an enemy champion, summon a comet above them. The comet lands after 1 second, dealing additional <magic> magic damage</magic> in the area. This effect has a 6s cooldown per target per spell cast.

667112.name: Flesheater
667112.description:
<bold><keyword>Hack the Meat:</keyword></bold> Dealing damage shreds 3 <armor>Armor</armor> and <mr>Magic Resist</mr> for 5 seconds, stacking up to 10 times. Applying stacks has a 1 second cooldown per Ability.
<bold><keyword>Cannibalize:</keyword></bold> On Champion Takedown, Heal yourself and your ally for <health>18% of the Target's Max Health</health>.

667666.name: The Collector
667666.description:
<bold><keyword>Death:</keyword></bold> Your damage executes champions that are below 5% Health.
<bold><keyword>Taxes:</keyword></bold> Champion kills grant <gold>25 bonus gold</gold>.

994403.name: Golden Spatula
994403.description:
<bold><keyword>Doing Something:</keyword></bold> You are permanently On Fire!

<italic>"It must do something...
Declined, it does EVERYTHING"</italic>
